name: Fifny Cloud Configurators
author: Fifny

sections.description:
At easy way integrate your e-commerce with Fifny Cloud. Plugin gives you possibility to add configured set to your WooCommerce store and next give possibility for customers to buy configuration.

How it works

Create your own configurator in Cloud Fifny. Install and activate Fifny Cloud Configurators Plugin in your WordPress and embed share code into your product or page. From now every configuration could be buy on your store. Instruction how to embed sharing code is available here.

Configurators

We can create for you your custom configurator with custom configuration options, you can use our templates or create it by yourself. Detailed information are available here.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WooComemerce at version 3.6.5 or high
  • Enabled REST API

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option – WordPress will handles the file transfer, and you won’t need to leave your web browser. Log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click Add New.

In the search field type Fifty Cloud Configurators then click Search Plugins. You can install it by click Install Now.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the Fifny Cloud Configurators plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application – instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.

How to embed configurator

Just embed share code to your page/product. Instructions on how to do this here.
